The Ptibliek are respectfully informed that

A MAGNIFICENT SPECTACLE
is in preparation a; this Theatre, which will embrace the principal Features of the above splendid and imposing
Ctremony: it will be produced with all the speed compatible with the true Representation of such a Subject.
The Dresses will be from Drawing taken on the Spot by a Gentleman sent thither for that purpose—and
the Architectural Scenery and Embellishments ["join Designs made under the immediate superintendence of the
Royal Architects, LK COINTE and D*HI;TOFFE, to whom the whole arrangement of the Cathedral was confided.

The DOORS to be opened at HALF past SIX—the Play to begin exactly at SEVEN.
Boxes 7s.—Second Price 3s. fid.—Pit 3s. Gd.—Second Price 2s—Gallery 2s.—Second Price I s .
Upper Cillery Is.—Second Price 6d
No Money to be returned.
